location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Political Department letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is written from Bombay. Stannus requests that some compensation be paid to Captain Evan Jervis for his period in charge of the Residency, and that an allowance be paid to Assistant Surgeon James Pringle Riach, who had perforned all the duties of the Residency since Stannus had left Muscat on sick certificate.
